titleStmt.title: The temple service as it stood in the dayes of our Saviour, described by John Lightfoot
titleStmt.author: Lightfoot, John, 1602-1675.

publicationStmt.publisher: printed by R. Cotes for Andrevv Crooke, at the Greene Dragon in Pauls Church-yard,

notesStmt.note: Identified as STC 15594 on UMI microfilm, Early English books, 1475-1640.
Reproductions of the originals in the Bodleian Library (Early English books, 1475-1640) and the British Library (Thomason Tracts).
